TuneSDM 0.1.0
  • Get Started


    TuneSDM is a user-friendly Shiny application for building and visualizing Species Distribution Models (SDMs). It automates data handling, hyperparameter tuning with grid search and Bayesian optimization, and model transfer, all without coding.

    Explore an intuitive interface to:

    • Upload species occurrence and environmental data
    • Tune models using grid search or Bayesian optimization
    • Create ensembles of best-performing models
    • Transfer predictions to future climate scenarios
    • Visualize outputs using interactive maps and response curves
